general_advisory: Start sowing kharif crops when the monsoon gives a cumulative rainfall of more than 70 mm. Choose the variety according to land type and available resources. Change certified seeds after three years. Test own seeds for germination before sowing. Incorporate Dhaincha seeds @ 10kg/ac for soil conditioning.

advisory: Prepare well-cultivated dry beds for paddy transplantation. Sow seeds in beds with FYM. Apply urea for seedling growth.
Treat seeds with Rhizobium and Carbendazim before sowing. Use good varieties like IP-02-14, OUM-11-5, Pant-19.
Choose quality seeds like Upas-120, ICPl 86012, Pusa Arhar. Prefer early to medium duration varieties.
Choose good varieties like Arjuna, Kalua, Sriprava for sowing after good rainfall.
Choose varieties like Kalinga Maize, Prabal for sowing. Apply nitrogenous fertilizers after land preparation.
Select varieties like Dharani, Smruti, Kadri-6 for sowing. Treat seeds with Vitavax power and Rhizobium.
Ensure proper drainage of excess water for planting ginger.
Ensure proper drainage of excess water for planting turmeric.
Use pheromone traps or neem-based pesticides for insect control in vegetables.
